remarks: Limit at the lower bound, of a continuous function defined on a left closed right open interval.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
icocncflimc.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
icocncflimc.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR* ) $.
icocncflimc.altb $e |- ( ph -> A < B ) $.
icocncflimc.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( ( A [,) B ) -cn-> CC ) ) $.
icocncflimc $p |- ( ph -> ( F ` A ) e. ( ( F |` ( A (,) B ) ) limCC A ) ) $.
